name: Falling in Love
description: This GIF is the first of series of morphing frame-by-frame animations that I've created in 2015 and published on Tumblr and across other social media. During 2011-2016  I've created 1.8K+ GIFs gaining 691,000,000 views in totlal on GIPHY alone. This series of 50 animated works have become the most videly used in people's 'stories'. Hic et nunc feels like a perfect platform to mint this series of animated loops. I hope you'll enjoy them and some of you might be able to collect All of them;) <3 ~ Yura Miron
